survey_name: AI-Powered Mental Wellness App User Feedback Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather user feedback on AI-powered mental wellness apps to improve functionality, user experience, and effectiveness.

questions.question_text: How often do you use AI-powered mental wellness apps?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you use AI-powered mental wellness apps?

questions.question_text: Which features do you find most useful in AI-powered mental wellness apps? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections with checkboxes. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.

script.question_text: Which features do you find most useful in AI-powered mental wellness apps? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for AI-powered mental wellness apps?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for AI-powered mental wellness apps?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI-powered mental wellness app you use most frequently?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'This is my first time' to Q1
